医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
每剂联合免疫疗法产生不同的 T 细胞波一种随着时间的推移监测免疫健康模式的新工具揭示了两种检查点抑制剂疗法如何在每次输注时协同作用来招募新的抗癌 T 细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Distinct-waves-of-T-cells- generated-by-each-dose-of-combination-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Distinct-waves-of-T-cells- generated-by-each-dose-of-combination-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a989777-647f-41eb-a623-aae690c65918 Thu, 29 Aug 2024 12:40:50 -0400 Distinct waves of T cells generated by each dose of combination immunotherapy
研究揭示 A20 蛋白在控制肝脏疾病炎症中的关键作用全世界有许多人患有慢性肝病 (CLD)，这引起了人们对其导致肝细胞癌或肝衰竭的倾向的严重关注。 CLD 的特点是炎症和纤维化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Study-reveals-key-role-of-A20- Protein-in-controlling-inflammation-in-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Study-reveals-key-role-of-A20- Protein-in-controlling-inflammation-in-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1198925-3340-47da-8c76-9f55baa0a824 Thu, 29 Aug 2024 12:27:56 -0400 Study reveals key role of A20 protein in controlling inflammation in liver disease
2023 年成年人大麻和致幻剂使用量仍处于历史最高水平根据密歇根大学“监测未来”调查的最新发现，过去一年使用大麻和致幻剂的成年人比例在 2023 年保持在历史高位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Cannabis-and-hallucinogen-use-stayed-at-historically-high-among-adults-in-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Cannabis-and-hallucinogen-use-stayed-at-historically-high-among-adults-in-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2127af53-8391-4b16-98c3-27b5d2130530 Thu, 29 Aug 2024 12:22:18 -0400 Cannabis and hallucinogen use stayed at historically high among adults in 2023
建议所有成年人进行常规脂蛋白(a) 检测心脏专家表示，每个人一生中都应该至少定期测量一次脂蛋白 (a) (Lp(a) 水平，欧盟人口最多的国家之一波兰的研究表明，Lp(a) 水平高是常见的情况。 ）属于一般人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Routine-lipo Protein(a)-testing-recommended-for-all-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Routine-lipo Protein(a)-testing-recommended-for-all-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55d200ff-120f-4e7a-8b15-ed17061e61e7 Thu, 29 Aug 2024 12:14:00 -0400 Routine lipoprotein(a) testing recommended for all adults
绘制 DNA 隐藏的结状结构图谱可能会彻底改变疾病治疗对 DNA 隐藏结构的创新研究可能会开辟治疗和诊断疾病（包括癌症）的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Mapping-DNAe28099s-hidden-knot-like-structs-may-revolutionize-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Mapping-DNAe28099s-hidden-knot-like-structs-may-revolutionize-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae9158bf-32f9-49c5-8c91-d414d31a62a3 Thu, 29 Aug 2024 12:04:31 -0400 Mapping DNA’s hidden knot-like structures may revolutionize disease treatment
子宫内膜异位症与女性心脏病和中风风险增加有关根据 2024 年 ESC 大会上发表的研究，1 患有子宫内膜异位症的女性与没有子宫内膜异位症的女性相比，出现严重心脏后果的风险要高 20%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Endometriosis-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-attack-and-中风-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Endometriosis-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-attack-and-中风-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a958181-f835-49f6-9399-19bfeb088de8 Thu, 29 Aug 2024 09:30:18 -0400 Endometriosis linked to increased risk of heart attack and stroke in women
研究发现，戒烟可使主要心血管事件减少近一半根据今天在 ESC 2024 年大会上发表的研究，患有稳定性冠状动脉疾病的患者在诊断后的任何时间点戒烟，可将发生重大事件的风险降低近 50%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Smoking-cessation-reduces-major-cardioangio-events-by-almost-half-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Smoking-cessation-reduces-major-cardioangio-events-by-almost-half-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13387257-64b7-4166-9a10-e94369a9d516 Thu, 29 Aug 2024 09:22:36 -0400 Smoking cessation reduces major cardiovascular events by almost half, study finds
患有精神疾病的女孩不太可能接种 HPV 疫苗与同龄人相比，患有精神疾病或神经发育问题的女孩接种可预防未来宫颈癌的 HPV 疫苗的可能性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Girls-with-mental-illness-less-likely-to-receive-HPV-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Girls-with-mental-illness-less-likely-to-receive-HPV-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=707811f7-0a06-4c6d-9d7e-a82c913b1fcb Thu, 29 Aug 2024 09:18:00 -0400 Girls with mental illness less likely to receive HPV vaccination
周末睡眠可使心脏病风险降低 20%每周的工作需求通常受到学校或工作时间表的影响，可能会导致睡眠中断和剥夺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Weekend-sleep-could-lower-heart-disease-risk-by-2025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Weekend-sleep-could-lower-heart-disease-risk-by-2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ad3de8f-91e6-40c1-bf3e-ff9e22bae6e8 Thu, 29 Aug 2024 09:09:42 -0400 Weekend sleep could lower heart disease risk by 20%
研究探讨前列腺癌治疗与阿尔茨海默病之间的联系奥古斯塔大学乔治亚医学院的研究人员正在寻找一种更好的方法来了解为什么许多患有前列腺癌的男性最终会患上阿尔茨海默病，以及是否是标准的激素疗法或过度活跃的免疫反应实际上导致了这一问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Study-explores-link- Between-prostate-cancer-treatment-and-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Study-explores-link- Between-prostate-cancer-treatment-and-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cbeaf3a-5afc-4cc5-8306-02394c5d4afb Thu, 29 Aug 2024 09:04:55 -0400 Study explores link between prostate cancer treatment and Alzheimer’s disease
